ygData.subject: Correction
ygData.msgSnippet: A few corrections on my previous post: 1. Pyro went into robot mode, not beast mode. He ain t got no beast mode. 2. I ve had Scavanger and Breakdown mixed up

A few corrections on my previous post:

1. Pyro went into robot mode, not beast mode. He ain't got no beast mode.
2. I've had Scavanger and Breakdown mixed up all along! Scavanger is the 
HUMVEE, so I think it'd be best to just say that Scavanger and Breakdown have 
been their proper selves all along (Scavanger being the HUMVEE).

Sorry about the inconvenience, but I'm kinda writing an essay while posting, 
so I can't really concentrate too well.
